name: The 12th International Conference on Management, Economics and Humanities
content: Vienna, Austria will be the host of the 12th International Conference on Management, Economics and Humanities. Between the 25th and 27th of March 2022, scientists, researchers, and scholars from around the world will come together at this management conference to discuss common challenges, brainstorm creative solutions, present findings from their latest research, and help shape the global discourse in the field. Having been organized for over a decade now, ICMEH is one of the most well-known and highly respected management conferences of 2022\. It’s your chance to find new collaborators, discover unique perspectives, and learn about trends in the fields of management, economics, and humanities on the global, national, and local levels. Get inspired. Get creative. Get connected. If you can’t come to Vienna for this economics conference, we encourage you to join us virtually.
topics: Banking finance fintech and regulations financial
